price: Moses said, “Lord of the east and west and all that is between them, if only you had sense!”
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
